name: Encoded Plans
bodytext: All units in this region have +1 difficulty. YYY xxRIGHT Move to location with the most units.

name: Mole Hunt
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard any unit or guard in play. YYY xxRIGHT Remove lowest xxMILITARY from pool and discard.

name: Prismatic Lotus
bodytext: Movement from this location costs +1. YYY xxRIGHT Each character at this location may draw 2 character cards.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: Tripwire
bodytext: A character moving into this location takes 2 xxBODY.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: Orb of Seeing
bodytext: xxRIGHT Move to location with lowest xxLORE character. Each character in this region takes 1 xxPSYCHE. Reroll all asset dice in this region.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: The Resistance
bodytext: xxOVERCOME May discard all guards in the region. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: Hidden Outpost
bodytext: Movement to xxREDBANK from this location costs 1. YYY xxOVERCOME May discard any xxMILITARY card in play.

name: Background Checks
bodytext: All guards in this location have +1 difficulty. YYY xxRIGHT Move to location with the most guards.

name: Praetorians
bodytext: If at xxREDBANK location, counts for 2 xxMILITARY threats. YYY xxRIGHT Move to xxMILITARY location in xxREDBANK.

name: Breakout!
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove all xxESPIONAGE from pool and discard.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: Imperial Guard
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Move guard to Imperial location with most asset dice.

name: Imperial Guard Captain
bodytext: Movement from this location costs +1. YYY xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 1 xxPSYCHE.

name: Military Sabotage
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard all Units from play. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Darkness Unmasked
bodytext: Move one diplomat to this location. YYY xxRIGHT If there is a diplomat at this location, all characters in region take 3 xxBODY. Discard.

name: Imperial Secrets
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Look at top 2 xxEMPIRE obstacles and choose one to discard. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Forager's Cloak
bodytext: xxFIRE If three Forager cards have been burned, unlock Lucia.

name: Clove and Minx
bodytext: xxRIGHT All characters at this location +1 xxPSYCHE and remove lowest xxSTABILITY from pool.

name: Bandit Camp
bodytext: xxRIGHT One character in this region takes 4 xxBODY and discard.

name: Doom Under Sightrock
bodytext: xxRIGHT All characters in region take 2 xxPSYCHE for each xxSIX in xxSORCERY pool. Search discard pile for Angry Mob. If found, put into play here.

name: Storms
bodytext: A character moving into this location takes 1 xxBODY.

name: Ambush!
bodytext: xxRIGHT One character in this region takes 3 xxBODY and discard.

name: Remote Influence
bodytext: xxRIGHT All characters in this region take 2 xxPSYCHE.

name: Rousing Speech
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard any xxSTABILITY obstacle. YYY xxRIGHT All characters in this region take 1 xxPSYCHE and discard.

name: Culture Clash
bodytext: xxRIGHT All characters at location take 2 xxPSYCHE. Discard.

name: Angry Mob
bodytext: xxRIGHT Any character at this location takes 1 xxBODY.

name: Spy Unmasked
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard any spy. YYY xxRIGHT Draw one xxEMPIRE obstacle. Discard.

name: The Forgotten Dead
bodytext: xxRIGHT Set all dice in xxSTABILITY pool to 1. Discard.

name: Angry Mob
bodytext: xxRIGHT Any character at this location takes 1 xxBODY.

name: Restless Dead
bodytext: If in urban or rural location, this card counts for 2 xxSTABILITY threat tags. YYY xxRIGHT Move to urban or rural xxREDBANK location.

name: Radiant Fernbrake
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Add 2 xxBODY to a character at this location and discard. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Forward Shelters
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Every character at this location adds 2 xxBODY. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Following Ley Lines
bodytext: xxOVERCOME May move any number of xxSORCERY resource dice to this location. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: The Necromancer
bodytext: xxFIRE Unlock Oniri. YYY xxRIGHT Every character in region takes xxPSYCHE condition if there is a pair in xxSORCERY pool.

name: Territorial Dispute
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove all xxMILITARY assets in the game. Discard.

name: The Amber Hand
bodytext: xxRIGHT All characters in region take 1 xxPSYCHE for each issue or mob in play.

name: False Confidence
bodytext: xxRIGHT If Imperial xxTECHNOLOGY > Red Bank xxTECHNOLOGY,  all characters in region take 3 xxBODY. Discard.

name: Restless Dead
bodytext: If in urban or rural location, this card counts for 2 xxSTABILITY threat tags. YYY xxRIGHT Move to urban or rural xxREDBANK location.

name: Repeating Histories
bodytext: Achievements using xxSORCERY dice may not be completed while this is in play. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Costume Ball
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard one diplomat in this region. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Securing the Perimeter
bodytext: xxRIGHT Everyone in region takes 2 xxBODY. Discard.

name: Secrets and Lies
bodytext: xxOVERCOME May burn any spy in any obstacle discard pile. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Tradition, or Reform?
bodytext: xxRIGHT One character in this region takes 1 xxPSYCHE.

name: Inadequate Defenses
bodytext: xxRIGHT One character at a xxREDBANK or xxSETTLED location takes 2 xxBODY.

name: Lost in Translation
bodytext: xxRIGHT Reroll all asset dice in this location. Any character at this location takes 1 xxPSYCHE.

name: Animaelic Forest
bodytext: xxRIGHT If there are less than 3 dice in xxSORCERY pool, all characters take 2 xxPSYCHE.

name: Allocating Funds
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove lowest xxTECHNOLOGY die from pool. Discard.

name: Wine and Roses
bodytext: xxOVERCOME All characters at location add 2 xxPSYCHE. YYY xxRIGHT All characters in region take 1 xxPSYCHE. Discard.

name: Hogel
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove 1 asset die from this region. Move to location with most asset dice.

name: Looking West
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Discard one unit. xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Order of the Blue Robes
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove highest die from xxSORCERY pool.

name: Taichu
bodytext: xxRIGHT One character at this location takes 2 xxPSYCHE.

name: Zarrah
bodytext: xxRIGHT Characters at this location take 1 xxPSYCHE and then may move to any other location.

name: Egalitarian Society
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Add 2 dice to xxSTABILITY pool. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Risky Projects
bodytext: xxOVERCOME Move a unit to any location. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Northern Patrol

name: Finer Things
bodytext: xxRIGHT Remove 1 xxSTABILITY asset die from any location. Discard.

name: Battle Plans
bodytext: All xxMILITARY obstacles need an additional xxONE to xxOVERCOME. YYY xxRIGHT Discard.

name: Samo
bodytext: xxRIGHT Add xxMILITARY asset to this location and all characters in region take 1 xxPSYCHE.
